context: Do you know of anything that Ros Ballaster wrote?
Sure, Ros Ballaster wrote Sense and Sensibility, a historical drama. It was also made into a movie produced by Lindsay Doran.
Didn't Hugh Laurie star in Sense and Sensibility?
I don't know, but Hugh Grant made an appearance as well as James Fleet
Ok, Do you know when it was first released?
The movie was released in 1995 by Colombia Pictures directed by Ang Lee. Would you like other movies like Ang Lee?
Yes, what are the other movies by Ang Lee?
resp: Ang Lee's other movies include Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon, The Ice Storm, Hulk, Sense and Sensibility, Life of Pi, and Brokeback Mountain.
